reviews.text: In case if you need to stay close to whitefield area, do not think twice, just check in to Fortune Select Trinity.
reviews.title: What an outstanding hotel

reviews.text: I checked in to this hotel on 25th July 2012 and checked out on 28th July 2012 on an official visit. Check in process was a breeze because of friendly and professional front desk people.
reviews.title: Great stay in Bangalore

reviews.text: Room was spacious, clean, with moden amenities, nice greenery outside the window of room 3138 that I stayed.
reviews.title: Lovely stay, fantastic service!

reviews.text: Ms. Sheila, customer care officer? was an example of high degree of professionalism, can spot you without fail if you introduce yourself once. She is one point solution of you have any questions to make your stay comfortable.
reviews.title: Good Business Hotel in Bangalore

reviews.text: Mr.Vikram Jaswal is a smart General Manager, mingles well with customers and takes care of them to a great extent. I am sure he will make this hotel a favourite destination for travellers.
reviews.title: Great option for Bangalore (Whitefield) business trips

reviews.text: Had a very enjoyable 2 week stay at the Fortune Select Trinity in Bangalore. The facility itself is very nice and comfortable and the staff goes out of their way to make you feel special and comfortable. Sheila Zachariah is an absolute GEM and goes out of her to check on you several times a day. She will be sure to find out about any issues and assure that any need is taken care of.
reviews.title: VERY ENJOYABLE STAY

reviews.text: The new Fitness Center is very nice; a new trainer started while we were there and assisted with special work-outs and stretches. His personal concern and assistance were greatly appreciated.
reviews.title: Average hotel. Lots to improve.

reviews.text: The staff in the restaurant take great care to serve you each morning; they all greet you very kindly and after a day or two, all remember your beverage of choice and even how you like your eggs custom cooked! The Zodiac staff also makes you as welcome. Food is consistently a good quality in both restaturants and room service was always quick and efficient.
reviews.title: Accomodations, Food, and Guest Relations Second to No One

reviews.text: The room staff goes out of their way to make your room your home away from home and I was pleasantly surprised with flowers and "towel" sculptures on my bed several times.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, warmly recommended

reviews.text: After seeing quite excellent feedback for this hotel, let me tell people that this hotel did not live up to our expectations when we had our Project Party for 120 people in mid-July at North Parade. The food and drinks supplied seemed good only for 70 people. The starters were not adequate compared to what is served in other hotels for such parties. After having danced for 2 hours, quite a good number of people found that all the sweets(rasmalai) and naan were over. Indirectly, it seemed we were asked to take the left-overs. Not even one serving staff was visible after 10:30pm. Note that this feedback is from all senior people in our team and not only from one person. I really want you take all such feedback seriously or you may soon risk losing repeat customers.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.text: The hotel is situated far from the city centre so it is not suited for a fun trip but if you have business in the Whitefield Area, this is the ideal place to go to. The rooms are spacious and the hotel is in general maintained well. The food may seem to lack variety but if you are in a job which requires you to live out of the suitcase, then do try their home-cooked food 'thali'. The only negative is that the internet is not so smooth.
reviews.title: Value for money even on business trips
A good place to stay
reviews.text: India is always a scary place to eat, this hotel is safe and tasty. I felt there was a good variety and most importantly, it was fresh. The staff are really great and good service counts for a lot.
The Good: Awesome Service, Nice Gym, Great Food, clean rooms
reviews.title: Great experience, Value for money!
Good is good.
reviews.text: The not so Good: As its not close to a food store, they could improve on the mini-bar range & familiar snacks. The lack of diet Coke or a choice of more that one chocolate can be improved on. (yes chocolate & diet coke, comfort food.)

It has truly been a great and memorable experience to stay at this hotel and trust me when I say this as I have had some horrible hotel experiences being an avid traveller. Excellent staff - helpful and welcoming, Great food, great location and a great place to conduct business and yes really easy on the pocket! will be back soon. Cheers!
reviews.title: A Business Hotel that makes you feel like "GOD"

reviews.text: In a word wow, from the lowest staff to the highest manager making sure that all is well with my stay, amazing thai food and attention to detail
reviews.title: Wow

reviews.text: My week at the Fortune Select Trinity was highlighted by the friendly staff and great service they provided. They checked on my needs and made sure they were met. The gym area was well maintained, along with the swimming pool area. Due to business meetings, all of my meals were at the hotel and I was very pleased with the quality and service. Great job to all!
reviews.title: Great Service, Friendly Staff, & Business Friendly

reviews.text: Great hotel for visiting the local businesses in area. Very conveniently located near the site I was visiting for the week. Excellent service. Two good restraunts. Included breakfast was efficient and catered to westerners as well. Very clean, excellent staff. The staff added a personal touch and were always asking for feedback and corrected any issue I raised. Internet access was the only area I was less than pleased. Nice pool and gym. Very confortable.
reviews.title: Great for stay visiting local business.

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel from 1st May 2012 to 11th May 2012 for a work trip. The hotel was fantastic! I was traveling alone but was very well looked after and felt extremely comfortable here. The hotel was able to take care of all my needs and give me local advise and support. I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone coming to Bangalore, especially for work.
reviews.title: Thank-you!

reviews.text: first time in India and Bangalore and truly a memorable experience, was booked by my local company SAP and was really pampered from the staff to the managers checking up on my comfort. The ethos of the gm who i met on couple of times filters down to the managers and to the staff, amazing hospitality, though they need to add few security, food variety and room add on's - though this can easily be overlooked
reviews.title: Teriffic Business hotel and Hospitality
